A peaceful night fell over Akihabara.%K%P
Glittering, man-made stars shined colorfully\neverywhere, painting the city in light.%K%P
This was the night.%K%P
The end of one story, and the start of another.%K%P
But the star-filled skies give up no hints.%K%P
The passion of the people could not speak for itself,\nbut it could be felt in the air.%K%P
'Well, this is it, huh...'%K%P
'Yep.'%K%P
'You're on your own from here.'%K%P
'But I'll be down there watching you.'%K%P
'I know.\nYour presence stands out to me more than anyone.'%K%P
Our love bound us together.%K%P
She could probably find me faster than\nany other goddess could.%K%P
'OK then, here I go!'%K%P
'Go get 'em!'%K%P
And she was off.%K%P
Off on her own, as just Shuri Kisshouten herself,\nto take on this audition.%K%P
All I could do was watch her from the audience.%K%P
'Hey sis, have a sec? It's me, Shuri.\nListen, I don't have much time, so I'll just say it.'%K%P
'I made it all the way here with love and support\nfrom someone I love.'%K%P
'Now I want you to see what it has done for me.'%K%P
'You know, I've done all of this just so I could\nhave a chance to sing by your side.'%K%P
'Thanks for watching over me all this time.\nNext it'll be my turn to watch over you.'%K%P
'I'll show you tonight that I am capable.'%K%P
―It was time.%K%P
The clock struck 7pm and\nthe stage lit up under the spotlight.%K%P
And at that cue Sara came out on stage alone.%K%P
'Hey everyone, it's me, Sara Benzaiten.\nThank you all so very much for coming out\nto be with us here tonight.'%K%P
She was addressing the audience.%K%P
This was in part to kick off the finals,\nbut also it signified her retirement as an idol.%K%P
'Today will be my last day with L☆SEVEN.\nThe winner of tonight's finals will take my place\nin the group and pave way for a new era.'%K%P
'Even after I leave,\nthe Divine Idols will continue to shine on.\nI, for one, strongly believe so.%K%P
She would be leaving, but her words were encouraging.%K%P
I was sure her feelings truly resonated\nwith not just everyone at the venue,\nbut everyone around the world sharing this moment.%K%P
'And with that I am happy to kick off the auditions\nfor the next member of L☆SEVEN!'%K%P
And just like that the auditions started.%K%P
There were five goddesses who were chosen\nand made it through the preliminaries.%K%P
And just one of them would be selected\nto be the next L☆SEVEN member.%K%P
All were certainly there with hopes and dreams.%K%P
And they definitely all worked equally as hard.%K%P
All that was left was to see who would really shine\ntruest and brightest.%K%P
Who would be our next superstar?%K%P
No one would know until it was all over.%K%P
'Hi, I'm Kagura Amauzu!\nThanks for coming out, everyone!'%K%P
Kagura was up first.%K%P
The crowd roared for her lively performance.%K%P
She had never been one to stand out much,\nbut here she shone just like any other.%K%P
She even had her own loyal fans.\nAll their Sakimitama pooled together to empower her.%K%P
'OK then, here we gooo!'%K%P
The music started and Kagura began her performance.%K%P
I had spent so much time just with Shuri\nthat I didn't know what to expect.%K%P
But her dancing was just as wonderful as ever,\nand she never stopped smiling for a moment.%K%P
Anyone watching could tell that she had poured\neverything she had into this single performance.%K%P
'Thank you so much, everyone! I love you all!'%K%P
Even after her song ended, the excitement lingered.%K%P
She waved to the audience\nas she left stage to thunderous applause.%K%P
What followed was one magnificent show after another.%K%P
All of them with their own excited fans.%K%P
The Sakimitama of all those gathered here, as well as\nall those watching online, surely empowered\nall of the goddesses.%K%P
And then it was finally Shuri's turn.%K%P
When she stepped out on stage\nthe boisterous crowd grew instantly quiet.%K%P
'Good evening everyone, I am Shuri Kisshouten.'%K%P
'I've been readying my skills and my heart for this.'%K%P
'This will be the greatest performance I can offer.'%K%P
'Please enjoy my song, 'Haruiro'.'%K%P
Her powerful singing voice echoed across the stage.%K%P
Her voice cut through, crisp, clear, and true.%K%P
The audience was sucked in by it\nand their glowsticks rose in response.%K%P
'She really is the best...'%K%P
There was nothing left to hold her back.%K%P
She just moved closer and closer to her goal.%K%P
This audition was just a stop along the way.%K%P
If Kagura had everything an idol needed,\nShuri had everything a true superstar needed.%K%P
Just the sight of her caught your eyes.\nAnd her voice and dance consumed you.%K%P
She wasn't a people-person sort of idol,\nbut the kind that others aspired to be like.%K%P
This was only a glimpse of the true her.%K%P
But still, everyone watching could\nsense something in her.%K%P
'Here we go!'%K%P
As her song hit the chorus she looked straight at me.%K%P
And smiled.%K%P
It pained me a bit as her boyfriend,\nbut it was the sort of smile that\nwould make anyone fall for her.%K%P
But even this was only possible because of our love.%K%P
Everyone watching would think it was for them,\nand they would fall in love with her.%K%P
And then came the final blow.\nAn explosion of flowers.%K%P
Everyone, judges and all, was stunned.%K%P
Its brilliance was levels beyond the others,\nand no one could take their eyes off it.%K%P
Her voice, her dance, and the billowing blossoms.%K%P
These were all things with one purpose,\nto show her iridescence .%K%P
As she danced, eyes glittering, her voice made it\nknown to all that she LOVED singing.%K%P
And before we knew it her performance was over.%K%P
'Phew... Thank you so much, everyone!'%K%P
With that everyone seemingly returned to earth.%K%P
And the place exploded into shouts and applause.%K%P
No one needed to wait for the judges.%K%P
Everyone knew, then and there, who had won.%K%P
'You did it, Shuri. That was absolutely incredible.'%K%P
A new star was born that night.%K%P
And the story of Shuri Kisshouten was about to begin.%K%P
